Text:
A sample (video) would have been appreciated, as is generally included in DDR's RIPs :)

Anyway, I'm already halfway (around 35%) done with ur previous RIP, so I doubt I'd have stopped & removed it for this one since my broadband plan gives a shitty speed of around 25 kbps on an average.

DDR please give me your rss feed address.
send it to me on hundred_or_zero@yahoo.com
in case i forget to read your reply here in comments.
